comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
That has to be the Mort & Co. warehouse at Circular Quay in the background.  Cnr of <del>Albert</del> Alfred Street and Young Street (then known as Elizabeth Street North).

From the shadows, about noon on a hot summers day.  A lot of rubble around ... ?

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] It has to be because it is. You're too damn good - Wool Store, Circular Quay: Mort & Co. Ltd [SLNSW: d1_05334]
